01871  *  
01872  *  - x,y           = coordinates to convert
01873  *  - viewx,viewy       = resultant coordinates
01874  */
01875 void UI_view2d_region_to_view(View2D *v2d, int x, int y, float *r_viewx, float *r_viewy)
01876 {
01877     float div, ofs;
01878 
01879     if (r_viewx) {
01880         div = (float)(v2d->mask.xmax - v2d->mask.xmin);
01881         ofs = (float)v2d->mask.xmin;
01882         
01883         *r_viewx = v2d->cur.xmin + (v2d->cur.xmax - v2d->cur.xmin) * ((float)x - ofs) / div;
01884     }
01885 
01886     if (r_viewy) {
01887         div = (float)(v2d->mask.ymax - v2d->mask.ymin);
01888         ofs = (float)v2d->mask.ymin;
01889         
01890         *r_viewy = v2d->cur.ymin + (v2d->cur.ymax - v2d->cur.ymin) * ((float)y - ofs) / div;
01891     }
01892 }
01893 
01894 /* Convert from 2d-View space to screen/region space
01895  *  - Coordinates are clamped to lie within bounds of region
01896  *
01897  *  - x,y               = coordinates to convert
01898  *  - regionx,regiony   = resultant coordinates
01899  */
01900 void UI_view2d_view_to_region(View2D *v2d, float x, float y, int *regionx, int *regiony)
01901 {
01902     /* set initial value in case coordinate lies outside of bounds */
01903     if (regionx)
01904         *regionx = V2D_IS_CLIPPED;
01905     if (regiony)
01906         *regiony = V2D_IS_CLIPPED;
01907     
01908     /* express given coordinates as proportional values */
01909     x = (x - v2d->cur.xmin) / (v2d->cur.xmax - v2d->cur.xmin);
01910     y = (y - v2d->cur.ymin) / (v2d->cur.ymax - v2d->cur.ymin);
01911     
01912     /* check if values are within bounds */
01913     if ((x >= 0.0f) && (x <= 1.0f) && (y >= 0.0f) && (y <= 1.0f)) {
01914         if (regionx)
01915             *regionx = (int)(v2d->mask.xmin + x * (v2d->mask.xmax - v2d->mask.xmin));
01916         if (regiony)
01917             *regiony = (int)(v2d->mask.ymin + y * (v2d->mask.ymax - v2d->mask.ymin));
01918     }
01919 }
01920 
01921 /* Convert from 2d-view space to screen/region space
01922  *  - Coordinates are NOT clamped to lie within bounds of region
01923  *
01924  *  - x,y               = coordinates to convert
01925  *  - regionx,regiony   = resultant coordinates
01926  */
01927 void UI_view2d_to_region_no_clip(View2D *v2d, float x, float y, int *regionx, int *regiony)
01928 {
01929     /* step 1: express given coordinates as proportional values */
01930     x = (x - v2d->cur.xmin) / (v2d->cur.xmax - v2d->cur.xmin);
01931     y = (y - v2d->cur.ymin) / (v2d->cur.ymax - v2d->cur.ymin);
01932     
01933     /* step 2: convert proportional distances to screen coordinates  */
01934     x = v2d->mask.xmin + x * (v2d->mask.xmax - v2d->mask.xmin);
01935     y = v2d->mask.ymin + y * (v2d->mask.ymax - v2d->mask.ymin);
01936     
01937     /* although we don't clamp to lie within region bounds, we must avoid exceeding size of ints */
01938     if (regionx) {
01939         if (x < INT_MIN) *regionx = INT_MIN;
01940         else if (x > INT_MAX) *regionx = INT_MAX;
01941         else *regionx = (int)x;
01942     }
01943     if (regiony) {
01944         if (y < INT_MIN) *regiony = INT_MIN;
01945         else if (y > INT_MAX) *regiony = INT_MAX;
01946         else *regiony = (int)y;
01947     }
01948 }
01949 
01950 /* *********************************************************************** */
01951 /* Utilities */
01952 
01953 /* View2D data by default resides in region, so get from region stored in context */
01954 View2D *UI_view2d_fromcontext(const bContext *C)
01955 {
01956     ScrArea *area = CTX_wm_area(C);
01957     ARegion *region = CTX_wm_region(C);
01958 
01959     if (area == NULL) return NULL;
01960     if (region == NULL) return NULL;
01961     return &(region->v2d);
01962 }
01963 
01964 /* same as above, but it returns regionwindow. Utility for pulldowns or buttons */
01965 View2D *UI_view2d_fromcontext_rwin(const bContext *C)
01966 {
01967     ScrArea *sa = CTX_wm_area(C);
01968     ARegion *region = CTX_wm_region(C);
01969 
01970     if (sa == NULL) return NULL;
01971     if (region == NULL) return NULL;
01972     if (region->regiontype != RGN_TYPE_WINDOW) {
01973         ARegion *ar = BKE_area_find_region_type(sa, RGN_TYPE_WINDOW);
01974         return ar ? &(ar->v2d) : NULL;
01975     }
01976     return &(region->v2d);
01977 }
01978 
01979 
01980 /* Calculate the scale per-axis of the drawing-area
01981  *  - Is used to inverse correct drawing of icons, etc. that need to follow view 
01982  *    but not be affected by scale
01983  *
01984  *  - x,y   = scale on each axis
01985  */
01986 void UI_view2d_getscale(View2D *v2d, float *x, float *y) 
01987 {
01988     if (x) *x = (v2d->mask.xmax - v2d->mask.xmin) / (v2d->cur.xmax - v2d->cur.xmin);
01989     if (y) *y = (v2d->mask.ymax - v2d->mask.ymin) / (v2d->cur.ymax - v2d->cur.ymin);
01990 }
01991 
01992 /* Check if mouse is within scrollers
01993  *  - Returns appropriate code for match
01994  *      'h' = in horizontal scroller
01995  *      'v' = in vertical scroller
01996  *      0 = not in scroller
01997  *  
01998  *  - x,y   = mouse coordinates in screen (not region) space
01999  */
02000 short UI_view2d_mouse_in_scrollers(const bContext *C, View2D *v2d, int x, int y)
02001 {
02002     ARegion *ar = CTX_wm_region(C);
02003     int co[2];
02004     int scroll = view2d_scroll_mapped(v2d->scroll);
02005     
02006     /* clamp x,y to region-coordinates first */
02007     co[0] = x - ar->winrct.xmin;
02008     co[1] = y - ar->winrct.ymin;
02009     
02010     /* check if within scrollbars */
02011     if (scroll & V2D_SCROLL_HORIZONTAL) {
02012         if (IN_2D_HORIZ_SCROLL(v2d, co)) return 'h';
02013     }
02014     if (scroll & V2D_SCROLL_VERTICAL) {
02015         if (IN_2D_VERT_SCROLL(v2d, co)) return 'v';
02016     }   
02017     
02018     /* not found */
02019     return 0;
02020 }
02021 
02022 /* ******************* view2d text drawing cache ******************** */
02023 
02024 /* assumes caches are used correctly, so for time being no local storage in v2d */
02025 static ListBase strings = {NULL, NULL};
02026 
02027 typedef struct View2DString {
02028     struct View2DString *next, *prev;
02029     union {
02030         unsigned char ub[4];
02031         int pack;
02032     } col;
02033     int mval[2];
02034     rcti rect;
02035 } View2DString;
02036 
02037 
02038 void UI_view2d_text_cache_add(View2D *v2d, float x, float y, const char *str, const char col[4])
02039 {
02040     int mval[2];
02041     
02042     UI_view2d_view_to_region(v2d, x, y, mval, mval + 1);
02043     
02044     if (mval[0] != V2D_IS_CLIPPED && mval[1] != V2D_IS_CLIPPED) {
02045         int len = strlen(str) + 1;
02046         /* use calloc, rect has to be zeroe'd */
02047         View2DString *v2s = MEM_callocN(sizeof(View2DString) + len, "View2DString");
02048         char *v2s_str = (char *)(v2s + 1);
02049         memcpy(v2s_str, str, len);
02050 
02051         BLI_addtail(&strings, v2s);
02052         v2s->col.pack = *((int *)col);
02053         v2s->mval[0] = mval[0];
02054         v2s->mval[1] = mval[1];
02055     }
02056 }
02057 
02058 /* no clip (yet) */
02059 void UI_view2d_text_cache_rectf(View2D *v2d, rctf *rect, const char *str, const char col[4])
02060 {
02061     int len = strlen(str) + 1;
02062     View2DString *v2s = MEM_callocN(sizeof(View2DString) + len, "View2DString");
02063     char *v2s_str = (char *)(v2s + 1);
02064     memcpy(v2s_str, str, len);
02065 
02066     UI_view2d_to_region_no_clip(v2d, rect->xmin, rect->ymin, &v2s->rect.xmin, &v2s->rect.ymin);
02067     UI_view2d_to_region_no_clip(v2d, rect->xmax, rect->ymax, &v2s->rect.xmax, &v2s->rect.ymax);
02068 
02069     v2s->col.pack = *((int *)col);
02070     v2s->mval[0] = v2s->rect.xmin;
02071     v2s->mval[1] = v2s->rect.ymin;
02072 
02073     BLI_addtail(&strings, v2s);
02074 }
02075 
02076 
02077 void UI_view2d_text_cache_draw(ARegion *ar)
02078 {
02079     View2DString *v2s;
02080     int col_pack_prev = 0;
02081     
02082     // glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
02083     // glPushMatrix();
02084     // glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
02085     // glPushMatrix();
02086     ED_region_pixelspace(ar);
02087     
02088     for (v2s = strings.first; v2s; v2s = v2s->next) {
02089         const char *str = (const char *)(v2s + 1);
02090         int xofs = 0, yofs;
02091 
02092         yofs = ceil(0.5f * (v2s->rect.ymax - v2s->rect.ymin - BLF_height_default("28")));
02093         if (yofs < 1) yofs = 1;
02094 
02095         if (col_pack_prev != v2s->col.pack) {
02096             glColor3ubv(v2s->col.ub);
02097             col_pack_prev = v2s->col.pack;
02098         }
02099 
02100         if (v2s->rect.xmin >= v2s->rect.xmax)
02101             BLF_draw_default((float)v2s->mval[0] + xofs, (float)v2s->mval[1] + yofs, 0.0, str, BLF_DRAW_STR_DUMMY_MAX);
02102         else {
02103             BLF_clipping_default(v2s->rect.xmin - 4, v2s->rect.ymin - 4, v2s->rect.xmax + 4, v2s->rect.ymax + 4);
02104             BLF_enable_default(BLF_CLIPPING);
02105             BLF_draw_default(v2s->rect.xmin + xofs, v2s->rect.ymin + yofs, 0.0f, str, BLF_DRAW_STR_DUMMY_MAX);
02106             BLF_disable_default(BLF_CLIPPING);
02107         }
02108     }
02109     
02110     // glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
02111     // glPopMatrix();
02112     // glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
02113     // glPopMatrix();
02114     
02115     if (strings.first) 
02116         BLI_freelistN(&strings);
02117 }
